==Origin==
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Hellions Squad was advised by [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]].{{r|New Mutants Vol 2 #10}}{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #2}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

==Academy X==
Even before their official formation, [[New Mutants Squad (Earth-616)|New Mutants Squad]] and the Hellions Squad were at odds with each other.{{r|New Mutants Vol 2 #1|#13}} The two squads became intensely competitive during Field Day events.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1|#4}} This rivalry came to a head when [[Kevin Ford (Earth-616)|Wither]] was arrested by the [[Federal Bureau of Investigation (Earth-616)|F.B.I.]]. The Hellions went to take on the F.B.I. and free Wither, and the New Mutants went to stop them from fighting the government. The [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] intervened before any damage was done, but Wither and [[Joshua Guthrie (Earth-616)|Icarus]] switched teams because of the event.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #5|#6}}

Wither continued to clash with [[Joshua Foley (Earth-616)|Elixir]] (primarily over [[Laurie Collins (Earth-616)|Laurie]]'s affections). During the semester, Wither discovered Elixir had had a brief affair with a professor, [[Rahne Sinclair (Earth-616)|Wolfsbane]]. He informed the entire school, successfully ending Josh's relationship with Laurie and terminating Wolfsbane's employment.{{r|New Mutants Vol 2 #12}}

The Hellions won first place in the Field Day Events at the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]].{{r|New X-Men: Academy X Yearbook #1}}

==Summer Vacation==
During the summer break, the Hellions Squad accompanied [[Julian Keller (Earth-616)|Julian Keller]] to his family's home in [[California (State)|California]].{{r|New X-Men: Hellions Vol 1 1}} There, they were contacted by the [[Kingmaker (Wallace) (Earth-616)|Kingmaker]], who gave them several extraordinary gifts in exchange for a favor.{{r|New X-Men: Hellions Vol 1 2}} The favor turned out to be robbery.{{r|New X-Men: Hellions Vol 1 3}} Seeing the error in their ways, the Hellions later took on Kingmaker and defeated him.{{r|New X-Men: Hellions Vol 1 4}}

==Notable Members==
* [[Sooraya Qadir (Earth-616)|Dust]] - Sooraya Qadir is a shy girl from [[Afghanistan]] who can turn herself into a living whirlwind of dust. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Julian Keller (Earth-616)|Hellion]] - Julian Keller is telekinetic. Field Leader. Retained his powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Cessily Kincaid (Earth-616)|Mercury]] - Cessily Kincaid's body is composed of non-toxic liquid mercury. Retained her powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Santo Vaccarro (Earth-616)|Rockslide]] - Santo Vaccarro exists as a golem entity able to create a body of solid rock. Retained his powers and remained with the X-Men.
* [[Brian Cruz (Earth-616)|Tag]] - Brian Cruz could psionically "tag" a person so that bystanders were compelled to run away from the person. Depowered, and killed in bus bombing by [[Purifiers (Earth-616)|Purifiers]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 24}}
* [[Kevin Ford (Earth-616)|Wither]] - Kevin Ford could destroy organic matter on touch. Retained his powers, but was later killed by [[Joshua Foley (Earth-616)|Elixir]].{{r|X-Force Vol 3 25}}

==M-Day==
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The New Mutants Squad was disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]]. Several squad members, who retained their powers, were inducted into the [[New X-Men (Earth-616)|New X-Men]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

* The squad’s colors were red and white with black accents.
